markdown: **Activate** <actions string="Free Action" />command ([metamagic](/Traits.aspx?ID=107))    **Effect** If your next action is to Cast a Spell that requires a spell attack roll against Armor Class, choose Fortitude DC or Reflex DC. You make your spell attack roll against that defense instead of AC. If the spell has multiple targets, the choice of DC applies to all of them.
